data.name: PKW.FUN
content: A meh, pretty much {{useless multi-tool}} that mostly just opens {{web pages}} to things i would need, along with a DDoS tool that {{probably even doesn't work}} because ooh, So kewl.
This is also {{unfinished}}, so some things aren't even coded. {{I gave up this project because i got bored of it}} and wanted to stir away from {{Python.}}

data.name: Discord Self-Bot
content: Used for fun, Now {{broken}} and the only way for fixing it is to {{recode it}} and make it an actual {{Discord BOT}}. Which i have done, But {{lost the files}}. So sucks to be me i guess.
This project is long gone, And i will most likely never make another one, ecsdi.

data.name: sudopkw.github.io
content: Crazy, Right? {{This website}} is one of the projects i've taken on as a way to help understand {{SQL}}, {{HTML}}, and {{CSS}} better, Although {{i don't see a future}} where i will {{build websites}}, I feel as it was a nice way to learn something {{new}} and {{experience}} other languages :D

I will still be making changes, and {{updating}} this website, as i go on {{learning}} and {{exploring}} other languages. Hopefully, In the near future this website will be stacked with new projects, skills, and experiences :)

Thanks to {{Arthur Wallendorff}} for being so kind, and letting me and many others inspect, and use his WallenArt Github as a {{project}} of thier own, to improve on thier {{skills}}, and learn more about {{building a website}}.
If i will make my own website from scratch in the future, It will be {{heavily inspired}} from this one as i absolutely love {{TUI}}, and i'm amazed as something so awesome is able to be built.
